issue.title: [C++] Define API for creating a kernel instance from function of scalar input and output with a particular signature
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1570](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1570). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This could include an `std::function` instance (but these cannot be inlined by the C++ compiler), but should also permit use with inline-able functions or functors

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1570?focusedCommentId=17116053) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This was basically achieved in ARROW-8792. Further work can be done with specific follow ups
